item.title: FT Most Read: Saturday, May 18, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:
1. Russian court seizes assets worth €700mn from UniCredit, Deutsche Bank and Commerzbank
2. [Opinion] What can and can’t be learnt from Singapore
3. Crozier’s claim he was unaware of Post Office scandal undermined by letters
4. Boeing shareholders rebuke chief executive Dave Calhoun
5. OpenAI put ‘shiny products’ over safety, departing top researcher says
item.guid: FT Most Read: Saturday, May 18, 2024 at 7:10 PM UTC
